abstract: Google and Facebook are must-buys for advertisers online, and the ad industry is watching Twitter closely to see if it follows a similar path.
snippet: Google and Facebook are must-buys for advertisers online, and the ad industry is watching Twitter closely to see if it follows a similar path.
lead_paragraph: Twitter at last looks serious about making money.

headline.main: After Building an Audience, Twitter Turns to Ads
headline.print_headline: After Building a Huge Audience, Twitter Turns to Ads to Cash In

byline.original: By Claire Cain Miller and Tanzina Vega

abstract: Twitter looks serious about making money, with the company introducing several advertising plans, courting Madison Avenue and promoting Dick Costolo, who led Twitter’s ad program, to chief executive.
snippet: Twitter looks serious about making money, with the company introducing several advertising plans, courting Madison Avenue and promoting Dick Costolo, who led Twitter’s ad program, to chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Twitter at last looks serious about making money.

headline.main: After Building an Audience, Twitter Turns to Ads

abstract: Microsoft’s antitrust settlement with European regulators is having little effect on the browser market, prompting a renewed debate about the effectiveness of such antitrust remedies.
snippet: Microsoft’s antitrust settlement with European regulators is having little effect on the browser market, prompting a renewed debate about the effectiveness of such antitrust remedies.
lead_paragraph: When Europe settled an antitrust case over Web browsers with Microsoft in December 2009, it hoped to dislodge the world’s biggest software maker from its dominant position in that market by requiring it to offer rivals’ products.

headline.main: Microsoft Deal in Europe Barely Affects Browser Market

abstract: Gentlemen, start your engines: the fledgling social gaming industry is revving up for a new wave of acquisitions and consolidation this coming year.
snippet: Gentlemen, start your engines: the fledgling social gaming industry is revving up for a new wave of acquisitions and consolidation this coming year.
lead_paragraph: Gentlemen, start your engines: the fledgling social gaming industry is revving up for a new wave of acquisitions and consolidation this coming year.

headline.main: Social Gaming Sector Braces for Deal Wave
